name: final-days
description:
Game Story

A young survivor left for dead by humanity now needing to survive on his own using the limited supplies he can scavenge to keep alive. He Is also forced out of his home by an Impending horde forcing him to travel through the sewers in order to reach the north point of the local town. 

-    The game is a 1st person zombie survival shooter where player is currently stationed in an abandoned warehouse on an industrial estate and needs to push forward to obtain new resources as well as a greater chance of survival. Using a given selection of weapons, the player must defeat the ambush of zombies and break onward for a stronger settlement. This game is inspired by titles such as ‘Resident Evil’ and ‘Left 4 Dead’. 

-    We worked together by collaboratively sharing ideas online. Everyone worked on the project in various areas such as productions, concepts and research. 

Controls - 

W,A,S,D For Movement 

Mouse wheel to swap between primary and secondary weapons 

E to interact with Items / Q to drop Items on the Floor 

F To activate the Gun Flashlights 

Space to jump / Shift to sprint
